title: OPPO A5 Pro Always Be Pro with You: Har Pakistani ke Strong Choice!
summary: In a world that demands more, OPPO is stepping up to redefine what a mid-range smartphone can be. OPPO is set to introduce its latest masterpiece, the OPPO A5 Pro, a device that redefines elegance, durability, and intelligence. With Pro Shock and Water Resistance, Pro AI, and Pro Style, this upcoming device is ready to redefine the smartphone experience.

title: Har Pal Zinda with OPPO Reno 13 Series – Pre-Orders Now Open!
summary: OPPO, the global leader in smart devices, has officially launched the highly anticipated OPPO Reno13 Series amidst the majestic, snow-capped mountains, the serene cold desert, and crystal-clear lakes of Skardu, Pakistan. This awe-inspiring natural paradise provided the perfect backdrop to showcase the elegance, innovation, and cutting-edge technology of the Reno13 Series. The Reno13 Series is now available for pre-order, setting new standards in both innovation and appearance.

title: Jazz and Mercantile Launch Pakistan’s First iPhone Trade-In Program
summary: Jazz, Pakistan’s leading digital conglomerate, in partnership with Mercantile, Apple’s authorized distributor in Pakistan, has introduced the country’s first-ever iPhone Trade-In Program, making the iPhone 16 series more accessible and affordable.

title: Microsoft to Officially Shutdown Skype in May 2025
summary: Microsoft has officially announced that Skype will be shutting down on May 5, 2025. The company is encouraging users to move to Microsoft Teams, which will replace Skype as the primary communication platform.

title: WhatsApp Rolls Out Exciting New Tool to Simplify Status Creation
summary: WhatsApp is introducing a new update to make creating and sharing status updates easier for users. The latest update is currently available to select beta testers who have installed the latest version of WhatsApp for Android.

title: 16-Year-Old Girl Develops First Sindhi Language Calculator Using Al
summary: A 16-year-old girl from Karachi has developed Pakistan’s first Sindhi-language calculator using artificial intelligence. She completed this project in just three days to assist Sindhi-speaking business owners with their daily calculations.
